name: Return To Red Planet
description:
Return To Red Planet is a retro style first person shooter in a sifi setting where you are stranded on an unknown planet and you have to find and fight your way through different dangerous places and enemies.

Features:

  • Retro style first person shooter like in the good old times
  • Based on a modern game engine (Unity)
  • Different weapons, e. g. handguns, bombs, shotguns, laser guns, melee
  • Dismember body parts by direct shooting or bombs
  • Pickup ammo, health and weapons you find on your way or in secret areas
  • Electro sound tracks and many sound fx effects

Development:

This game has been developed for over a year now and is based on the intention to give you the old school shooter feeling from the 90s. ASSETCREW is a team of currently three members who work on different aspects of the game - mainly divided into programming, visuals and audio.

Roadmap:

We have planned to release the next update in the first quarter of 2019. We want to expand the game a lot more to give you an even bigger experience. Therefor we also kindly ask you to send us your comments and feedback what you think about the game. Thanks a lot in advance!
